00125 void CreateACharacterFromPlayerEnteredStats( void )
00126 {
00127 
00128             // Kaiden: Seems like as good a place as any to stash this function call to
00129             // ensure that these lists don't get overwritten or Nulled due to the amount
00130             // of changes and revisions that have been made to personalities and attitudes.
00131       CreatePlayersPersonalitySkillsAndAttitude();
00132 
00133 
00134 
00135       // copy over full name
00136   wcscpy( gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].zName, pFullName );
00137 
00138       // the nickname
00139       wcscpy( gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].zNickname, pNickName ); 
00140   
00141       // gender 
00142       if ( fCharacterIsMale == TRUE )
00143       {
00144     // male
00145     gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bSex = MALE;
00146       }
00147       else
00148       {
00149             // female
00150     gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bSex = FEMALE;
00151       }
00152 
00153 
00154       // attributes
00155       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bLifeMax         = ( INT8 )iHealth;
00156   gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bLife       = ( INT8 )iHealth;
00157       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bAgility    = ( INT8 )iAgility;
00158       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bStrength   = ( INT8 )iStrength;
00159       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bDexterity  = ( INT8 )iDexterity;
00160       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bWisdom     = ( INT8 )iWisdom; 
00161       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bLeadership = ( INT8 )iLeadership;
00162 
00163 
00164             // skills
00165       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bMarksmanship = ( INT8 )iMarksmanship;
00166       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bMedical      = ( INT8 )iMedical;
00167       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bMechanical   = ( INT8 )iMechanical;
00168       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bExplosive    = ( INT8 )iExplosives;
00169 
00170 
00171   // personality
00172       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bPersonalityTrait = ( INT8 )iPersonality;
00173   
00174       // attitude
00175   gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bAttitude = ( INT8 )iAttitude; 
00176   
00177       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bExpLevel = 1;
00178   
00179       // set time away
00180       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bMercStatus = 0;
00181 
00182       
00183   
00184       // face
00185        SelectMercFace( );
00186 
00187        return;
00188 
00189 }

00192 BOOLEAN DoesCharacterHaveAnAttitude( void )
00193 {
00194 
00195       // simply checks if caracter has an attitude other than normal
00196       switch( iAttitude )
00197       {
00198             case ATT_LONER:
00199             case ATT_PESSIMIST:
00200             case ATT_ARROGANT:
00201             case ATT_BIG_SHOT:
00202             case ATT_ASSHOLE:
00203             case ATT_COWARD:
00204                   return( TRUE );
00205             default:
00206                   return( FALSE );
00207       }
00208 }

00249 
00250 void CreatePlayerAttitude( void )
00251 {
00252 
00253       if(gGameExternalOptions.fPers_att)
00254             {
00255                   AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_OPTIMIST );
00256                   AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList(  ATT_LONER );
00257                   AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList(  ATT_FRIENDLY );
00258                   AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_ARROGANT );
00259                   AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_NORMAL );
00260                   AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_ASSHOLE );
00261                   AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_COWARD );
00262                   AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_AGGRESSIVE );
00263                   AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_PESSIMIST );
00264                   AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_BIG_SHOT );    
00265 
00266                   // this function will 'roll a die' and decide if any attitude does exists
00267                   INT32 iDiceValue = 0;
00268                   INT32 iCounter = 0, iCounter2 = 0;
00269 
00270                   INT32 iAttitudeHits[NUM_ATTITUDES] = { 0 };
00271                   INT32 iHighestHits = 0;
00272                   INT32 iNumAttitudesWithHighestHits = 0;
00273 
00274                   iAttitude = ATT_NORMAL;
00275 
00276                   if ( iLastElementInAttitudeList == 0 )
00277                   {
00278                         return;
00279                   }
00280 
00281                   // count # of hits for each attitude
00282                   for ( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iLastElementInAttitudeList; iCounter++ )
00283                   {
00284                         iAttitudeHits[ AttitudeList[ iCounter ] ]++;
00285                   }
00286 
00287                   // find highest # of hits for any attitude
00288                   for ( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_ATTITUDES; iCounter++ )
00289                   {
00290                         if ( iAttitudeHits[ iCounter ] )
00291                         {
00292                               if ( iAttitudeHits[ iCounter ] > iHighestHits )
00293                               {
00294                                     iHighestHits = __max( iHighestHits, iAttitudeHits[ iCounter ] );
00295                                     iNumAttitudesWithHighestHits = 1;
00296                               }
00297                               else if ( iAttitudeHits[ iCounter ] == iHighestHits )
00298                               {
00299                                     iNumAttitudesWithHighestHits++;
00300                               }
00301                         }
00302                   }
00303 
00304                   // roll dice
00305                   iDiceValue = Random( iNumAttitudesWithHighestHits + 1 );
00306 
00307                   // find attitude
00308                   for ( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_ATTITUDES; iCounter++ )
00309                   {
00310                         if ( iAttitudeHits[ iCounter ] == iHighestHits )
00311                         {
00312                               if ( iCounter2 == iDiceValue )
00313                               {
00314                                     // this is it!
00315                                     iAttitude = iCounter2;
00316                                     break;
00317                               }
00318                               else
00319                               {
00320                                     // one of the next attitudes...
00321                                     iCounter2++;
00322                               }
00323                         }
00324                   }
00325             }
00326             else
00327             {
00328                   iAttitude = gGameExternalOptions.iCustomAttitude;
00329             }
00330 }

00332 
00333 void AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( INT8 bAttitude )
00334 {
00335       // adds an attitude to attitude list
00336 
00337       if( iLastElementInAttitudeList < ATTITUDE_LIST_SIZE)
00338       {
00339             // add element
00340             AttitudeList[ iLastElementInAttitudeList ] = ( INT32 )bAttitude;
00341     
00342             // increment attitude list counter  
00343             iLastElementInAttitudeList++;
00344       }
00345 
00346       return;
00347 }

00350 void AddSkillToSkillList( INT8 bSkill )
00351 {
00352   // adds a skill to skills list
00353 
00354   if( iLastElementInSkillsList < ATTITUDE_LIST_SIZE)
00355       {
00356             // add element
00357             SkillsList[ iLastElementInSkillsList ] = ( INT32 )bSkill;
00358     
00359             // increment attitude list counter  
00360             iLastElementInSkillsList++;
00361       }
00362 
00363       return;
00364 }

00366 // Kaiden : Added to clear the list when first visiting the IMP homepage,
00367 // Or for each visit there after.
00368 void ClearAllSkillsList( void )
00369 {
00370       INT32       iLoop;
00371 
00372       for ( iLoop = 0; iLoop < iLastElementInSkillsList; iLoop++ )
00373       {
00374             SkillsList[ iLoop ] = 0;
00375       }
00376       iLastElementInSkillsList = 0;
00377       return;
00378 }
00379 
00380 
00381 
00382 void RemoveSkillFromSkillsList( INT32 iIndex )
00383 {     
00384       INT32       iLoop;
00385 
00386       // remove a skill from the index given and shorten the list
00387       if ( iIndex < iLastElementInSkillsList )
00388       {
00389             memset( BackupSkillsList, 0, ATTITUDE_LIST_SIZE * sizeof( INT32 ) );
00390 
00391             // use the backup array to create a version of the array without
00392             // this index
00393             for ( iLoop = 0; iLoop < iIndex; iLoop++ )
00394             {
00395                   BackupSkillsList[ iLoop ] = SkillsList[ iLoop ];
00396             }
00397             for ( iLoop = iIndex + 1; iLoop < iLastElementInSkillsList; iLoop++ )
00398             {
00399                   BackupSkillsList[ iLoop - 1 ] = SkillsList[ iLoop ];
00400             }
00401             // now copy this over to the skills list
00402             memcpy( SkillsList, BackupSkillsList, ATTITUDE_LIST_SIZE * sizeof( INT32 ) );
00403 
00404             // reduce recorded size by 1
00405             iLastElementInSkillsList--;
00406       }
00407 }
00408 
00409 INT32 FindSkillInSkillsList( INT32 iSkill )
00410 {
00411       INT32       iLoop;
00412 
00413       for ( iLoop = 0; iLoop < iLastElementInSkillsList; iLoop++ )
00414       {
00415             if ( SkillsList[ iLoop ] == iSkill )
00416             {
00417                   return( iLoop );
00418             }
00419       }
00420 
00421       return( -1 );
00422 }
00423 
00424 void ValidateSkillsList( void )
00425 {
00426       INT32 iIndex;//, iValue;
00427       MERCPROFILESTRUCT * pProfile;
00428 
00429       // remove from the generated traits list any traits that don't match
00430       // the character's skills
00431       pProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ]);
00432       if ( pProfile->bMechanical == 0 )
00433       {
00434             // without mechanical, electronics is useless
00435             iIndex = FindSkillInSkillsList( ELECTRONICS );
00436             if ( iIndex != -1 )
00437             {
00438                   pProfile->bMechanical = 1;
00439             }
00440       }
00441 
00442         // Kaiden using UB's code, lockpicking can't be removed from the list "yet".
00443       // special check for lockpicking
00444       //iValue = pProfile->bMechanical;
00445       //iValue = ( iValue * pProfile->bWisdom ) / 100;
00446       //iValue = ( iValue * pProfile->bDexterity ) / 100;
00447       //if ( iValue + gbSkillTraitBonus[ LOCKPICKING ] < 50 )
00448       //{
00449       //    // not good enough for lockpicking!
00450       //
00451       //    // so is lockpicking
00452       //    iIndex = FindSkillInSkillsList( LOCKPICKING );
00453       //    while ( iIndex != -1 )
00454       //    {
00455       //          RemoveSkillFromSkillsList( iIndex );
00456       //          iIndex = FindSkillInSkillsList( LOCKPICKING );
00457       //    }
00458       //}
00459 
00460       if ( pProfile->bMarksmanship == 0 )
00461       {
00462             // without marksmanship, the following traits are useless:
00463             // auto weapons, heavy weapons
00464             iIndex = FindSkillInSkillsList( AUTO_WEAPS );
00465             if( iIndex != -1 )
00466             {
00467                   //RemoveSkillFromSkillsList( iIndex );
00468                   //iIndex = FindSkillInSkillsList( AUTO_WEAPS );
00469                   pProfile->bMarksmanship = 1;
00470             }
00471             // so is lockpicking
00472             iIndex = FindSkillInSkillsList( HEAVY_WEAPS );
00473             if( iIndex != -1 )
00474             {
00475                   //RemoveSkillFromSkillsList( iIndex );
00476                   //iIndex = FindSkillInSkillsList( HEAVY_WEAPS );
00477                   pProfile->bMarksmanship = 1;
00478             }
00479       }
00480 }
00481 
00482 void CreatePlayerSkills( void )
00483 {
00484 
00485   // this function will 'roll a die' and decide if any attitude does exists
00486   INT32 iDiceValue = 0;
00487       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00488 
00489       ValidateSkillsList();
00490 /* Kaiden - Commented out in UB to skip the whole random skill thing
00491       // roll dice
00492       iDiceValue = Random( iLastElementInSkillsList );
00493 
00494       // set attitude
00495       iSkillA = SkillsList[ iDiceValue ];
00496 
00497       // second dice value
00498       iDiceValue = Random( iLastElementInSkillsList );
00499 
00500       iSkillB = SkillsList[ iDiceValue ];
00501 */
00502   
00503         // Kaiden: This section was added in it's place:
00504       if( iLastElementInSkillsList > 0 )
00505       {
00506             // set attitude
00507             iSkillA = SkillsList[ 0 ];
00508       }
00509 
00510       if( iLastElementInSkillsList > 1 )
00511       {
00512             iSkillB = SkillsList[ 1 ];
00513       }
00514       else
00515       {
00516             iSkillB = SkillsList[ 0 ];
00517       }
00518 
00519       // allow expert level for generated merc so you CAN have two of the same
00520       // but there is no such thing as expert level for electronics
00521 
00522 
00523       while ( iSkillA == iSkillB && ( iSkillB == ELECTRONICS || iSkillB == AMBIDEXT ) )
00524       {
00525             // remove electronics as an option and roll again
00526             RemoveSkillFromSkillsList( iDiceValue );
00527             if ( iLastElementInSkillsList == 0 )
00528             {
00529                   // ok, only one trait!
00530                   iSkillB = NO_SKILLTRAIT;
00531                   break;
00532             }
00533             else
00534             {
00535                   iDiceValue = Random( iLastElementInSkillsList );
00536                   iSkillB = SkillsList[ iDiceValue ];
00537             }
00538       }
00539 
00540       /*
00541       // are the same, 
00542   // reroll until different, or until ATTITUDE_LIST_SIZE times
00543       iSkillB = Random( iLastElementInSkillsList + 1 );
00544 
00545       while( (iSkillA == iSkillB ) && ( iCounter < HOW_MANY_ROLLS_FOR_SAME_SKILL_CHECK ) )
00546       {
00547             // increment counter
00548             iCounter++;
00549 
00550             // next random 
00551     iSkillB = Random( iLastElementInSkillsList + 1 );
00552 
00553       }
00554   if( iCounter == ATTITUDE_LIST_SIZE ) 
00555       {
00556     iSkillB = NO_SKILLTRAIT;
00557       }
00558       return;
00559 
00560 
00561       */
00562 }

00573       // Commenting out the below if test
00574 
00575       //if ( bPersonlity != PSYCHO )
00576       //{
00577       //    return;
00578       //}
00579 
00580   // will add a persoanlity to persoanlity list
00581   if( iLastElementInPersonalityList < ATTITUDE_LIST_SIZE)
00582       {
00583             // add element
00584             PersonalityList[ iLastElementInPersonalityList ] = ( INT32 )bPersonlity;
00585     
00586             // increment attitude list counter  
00587             iLastElementInPersonalityList++;
00588       }
00589

00593 void CreatePlayerPersonality( void )
00594 {
00595 
00596       // Kaiden: Added for optional Mercenary personalities and attitudes
00597 
00598       if(gGameExternalOptions.fPers_att)
00599             {
00600                         // Kaiden: More chances for Psycho and Normal.
00601                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( NO_PERSONALITYTRAIT );
00602                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( PSYCHO );
00603                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( FORGETFUL );
00604                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( NERVOUS );
00605                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( HEAT_INTOLERANT );
00606                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( NO_PERSONALITYTRAIT );
00607                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( PSYCHO );
00608                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( CLAUSTROPHOBIC );
00609                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( NONSWIMMER );
00610                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( FEAR_OF_INSECTS );
00611                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( NO_PERSONALITYTRAIT );
00612                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( PSYCHO );                 
00613                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( FORGETFUL );
00614                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( NERVOUS );
00615                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( HEAT_INTOLERANT );
00616                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( NO_PERSONALITYTRAIT );
00617                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( PSYCHO );
00618                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( CLAUSTROPHOBIC );
00619                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( NONSWIMMER );
00620                   AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( FEAR_OF_INSECTS );
00621 
00622 
00623                   INT32 iDiceValue = 0;
00624                   INT32 iCounter = 0;
00625                   INT32 iCounter2 = 0;
00626 
00627                   // Kaiden: Roll dice 20 times just to be on the safe side 
00628                   // was getting too many repeats. Will end up scrapping
00629                   // rand() later anyway so will worry about fixing it then.
00630                   for (iCounter2 = 0; iCounter < 20; iCounter2++)
00631                   {
00632                         iDiceValue = Random( iLastElementInPersonalityList + 1 );
00633                   }
00634 
00635                   // Kaiden two chances to avoid a normal personality. As IMP
00636                   // says, They check it twice just to make sure :p
00637                   for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iLastElementInPersonalityList; iCounter++ )
00638                         {
00639 
00640                               DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("iDiceValue = %d",iDiceValue));
00641 
00642                               if( PersonalityList[ iDiceValue ] =  NO_PERSONALITYTRAIT )
00643                                     {
00644                                           //Kaiden: Roll one more time for good measure:
00645                                           iDiceValue = Random( iLastElementInPersonalityList + 1 );
00646                                     }
00647                         }
00648                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("And our Personality is... = %d",PersonalityList[ iDiceValue ]));
00649                         iPersonality = PersonalityList[ iDiceValue ];
00650             }
00651             else
00652             {
00653                   iPersonality = gGameExternalOptions.iCustomPersonality;
00654             }
00655       return;
00656 
00657 }

00715 void SelectMercFace( void )
00716 {
00717       // this procedure will select the approriate face for the merc and save offsets
00718 
00719       // grab face filename
00720 //  strcpy( gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].ubUnusedFaceFileName , pPlayerSelectedFaceFileNames[ iPortraitNumber ]);
00721 
00722       // now the offsets
00723   gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].ubFaceIndex = 200 + ( UINT8 )iPortraitNumber;
00724 
00725       // eyes
00726       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].usEyesX = sFacePositions[ iPortraitNumber ][ 0 ];
00727       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].usEyesY = sFacePositions[ iPortraitNumber ][ 1 ];
00728       
00729       // mouth
00730       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].usMouthX = sFacePositions[ iPortraitNumber ][ 2 ];
00731       gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].usMouthY = sFacePositions[ iPortraitNumber ][ 3 ];
00732 
00733       // set merc skins and hair color
00734       SetMercSkinAndHairColors( );
00735       return;
00736 }

00738 void SetMercSkinAndHairColors( void )
00739 {
00740       enum{ PINKSKIN, TANSKIN, DARKSKIN, BLACKSKIN, NUMSKINS };
00741       enum{ BROWNHEAD, BLACKHEAD, //black skin (only this line )
00742                 WHITEHEAD,                                  //dark skin (this line plus all above)
00743                         BLONDHEAD, REDHEAD,   //pink/tan skin (this line plus all above )
00744                         NUMHEADS  
00745                   };
00746 
00747       enum
00748       {
00749             WHITEVEST,
00750             GYELLOWSHIRT,
00751             YELLOWVEST,
00752             GREYVEST,
00753             BROWNVEST,
00754             PURPLESHIRT,
00755             BLUEVEST,
00756             JEANVEST,
00757             GREENVEST,
00758             REDVEST,
00759             BLACKSHIRT,
00760             NUMSHIRTS
00761       };//shirts
00762 
00763       enum
00764       {
00765             BLUEPANTS,
00766             BLACKPANTS,
00767             JEANPANTS,
00768             TANPANTS,
00769             BEIGEPANTS,
00770             GREENPANTS,
00771             NUMPANTS
00772       };//pants
00773 
00774       // skin strings
00775       STR sSkinStrings[]={
00776             "PINKSKIN",
00777             "TANSKIN",
00778             "DARKSKIN",
00779             "BLACKSKIN",
00780       };
00781 
00782       // the hair colors
00783       STR sHairStrings[]={
00784             "BROWNHEAD",
00785             "BLACKHEAD",
00786             "WHITEHEAD",
00787             "BLONDHEAD",
00788             "REDHEAD",
00789       };
00790 
00791       // shirts

00793             "WHITEVEST",
00794             "GYELLOWSHIRT",
00795             "YELLOWVEST",
00796             "greyVEST",
00797             "BROWNVEST",
00798             "PURPLESHIRT",
00799             "BLUEVEST",
00800             "JEANVEST",
00801             "GREENVEST",
00802             "REDVEST",
00803             "BLACKSHIRT",
00804       };//shirts
00805 
00806 
00807       // shirts
00808       STR sPantStrings[]={
00809             "BLUEPANTS",
00810             "BLACKPANTS",
00811             "JEANPANTS",
00812             "TANPANTS",
00813             "BEIGEPANTS",
00814             "GREENPANTS",
00815       };//pants
00816 
00817       // given the portrait number, set the merc's skin and hair color
00818       INT16 sSkinColor = 0, sHairColor = 0, sShirtColor, sPantColor;
00819

00821       {
00822             case( 0 ):

00831                   sShirtColor = BROWNVEST;
00832                   sPantColor = TANPANTS;
00833             break;
00834             case( 2 ):
00835                   sSkinColor = TANSKIN;
00836                   sHairColor = BROWNHEAD;
00837                   sShirtColor = WHITEVEST;
00838                   sPantColor = BLUEPANTS;
00839             break;
00840             case( 3 ):
00841                   sSkinColor = DARKSKIN;
00842                   sHairColor = BROWNHEAD;
00843                   sShirtColor = WHITEVEST;
00844                   sPantColor = BLACKPANTS;
00845             break;
00846             case( 4 ):
00847                   sSkinColor = TANSKIN;
00848                   sHairColor = BROWNHEAD;
00849                   sShirtColor = GREYVEST;
00850                   sPantColor = GREENPANTS;
00851             break;
00852             case( 5 ):
00853                   sSkinColor = DARKSKIN;
00854                   sHairColor = BLACKHEAD;
00855                   sShirtColor = GREYVEST;
00856                   sPantColor = BLACKPANTS;
00857                   break;
00858             case( 6 ):
00859                   sSkinColor = TANSKIN;
00860                   sHairColor = BROWNHEAD;
00861                   sShirtColor = BROWNVEST;
00862                   sPantColor = BLUEPANTS;
00863                   break;
00864             case( 7 ):

00866                   sHairColor = BROWNHEAD;
00867                   sShirtColor = BLACKSHIRT;
00868                   sPantColor = BLACKPANTS;
00869                   break;

00871                   sSkinColor = TANSKIN;
00872                   sHairColor = BROWNHEAD;

00886                   sPantColor = BLACKPANTS;
00887             break;

00889                   sSkinColor = TANSKIN;
00890                   sHairColor = BLACKHEAD;
00891                   sShirtColor = BLACKSHIRT;
00892                   sPantColor = BLACKPANTS;
00893             break;

00895                   sSkinColor = PINKSKIN;
00896                   sHairColor = BROWNHEAD;
00897                   sShirtColor = WHITEVEST;
00898                   sPantColor = GREENPANTS;
00899             break;
00900             case( 13 ):
00901                   sSkinColor = BLACKSKIN;
00902                   sHairColor = BROWNHEAD;
00903                   sShirtColor = GREYVEST;
00904                   sPantColor = BLACKPANTS;

00914                   sHairColor = BLONDHEAD;
00915                   sShirtColor = BROWNVEST;
00916                   sPantColor = GREENPANTS;
00917                   break;
00918       }
00919 
00920       // now set them
00921       strcpy( gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].HAIR, sHairStrings[ sHairColor ] );
00922       strcpy( gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].SKIN, sSkinStrings[ sSkinColor ] );
00923       strcpy( gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].PANTS, sPantStrings[ sPantColor ] );
00924       strcpy( gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].VEST, sShirtStrings[ sShirtColor ] );
00925 
00926 }

00928 
00929 void HandleMercStatsForChangesInFace( )
00930 {
00931       if ( fLoadingCharacterForPreviousImpProfile )
00932       {
00933             return;
00934       }
00935 
00936       //add the skills to the skills list
00937       AddSelectedSkillsToSkillsList();
00938 
00939       // now figure out skills
00940       CreatePlayerSkills();
00941 
00942       // body type
00943       if ( fCharacterIsMale  )
00944       {
00945     // male
00946             // big or regular
00947             // Madd - don't override the skills - override the body type instead
00948             if( ShouldThisMercHaveABigBody() && iSkillA != MARTIALARTS && iSkillB != MARTIALARTS )
00949             {
00950                   gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].ubBodyType = BIGMALE; 
00951                   
00952                   //if( iSkillA == MARTIALARTS )
00953                   //{
00954                   //    iSkillA = HANDTOHAND;
00955                   //}
00956                   //if( iSkillB == MARTIALARTS )
00957                   //{
00958                   //    iSkillB = HANDTOHAND;
00959                   //}
00960             }
00961             else
00962             {
00963               gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].ubBodyType = REGMALE; 
00964     }
00965       }
00966       else
00967       {
00968      // female
00969         gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].ubBodyType = REGFEMALE;
00970             
00971             if( iSkillA == MARTIALARTS )
00972             {
00973                   iSkillA = HANDTOHAND;
00974             }
00975             if( iSkillB == MARTIALARTS )
00976             {
00977                   iSkillB = HANDTOHAND;
00978             }
00979       }
00980 
00981 
00982       // skill trait
00983   gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bSkillTrait =  ( INT8 )iSkillA;
00984   gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bSkillTrait2 = ( INT8 )iSkillB;
00985 
00986 }
00987 
00988 BOOLEAN ShouldThisMercHaveABigBody( void )
00989 {
00990       // should this merc be a big body type
00991       // Madd - don't limit it by portrait
00992       //if ( ( iPortraitNumber == 0 ) || ( iPortraitNumber == 6 ) || ( iPortraitNumber == 7 ) )
00993       //{
00994             if ( gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bStrength >= 75 )
00995             {
00996                   return( TRUE );
00997             }
00998       //}
00999 
01000       return( FALSE );
01001 }
